room_title: Escape room "Nefertari's Tomb" by NM Escape Room in Albuquerque
review: So much fun at Nefertari's tomb. Only my family of four and our first time in an escape room. We almost made it, but had a blast. Best memories are made there. I definitely recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Nefertari's Tomb" by NM Escape Room in Albuquerque
review: Went with a group of 7 for my wife's birthday and it was a blast! We didn't succeed, but we plan to go again sometime with a different crew so we can work on different puzzles. The tomb was extremely fun and challenging!

room_title: Escape room "Nefertari's Tomb" by NM Escape Room in Albuquerque
review: We had a great time solving puzzles to locate the treasures in Nefertari's Tomb last week! It was an excellent and lovely room with lots of different puzzles to keep us guessing! Even though we didn't solve all the puzzles, we got out with lots of treasures! Thank you so much for a wonderful experience!

room_title: Escape room "Nefertari's Tomb" by NM Escape Room in Albuquerque
review: We have done 4 escape rooms with this business, including Nefertari's tomb and they NEVER disappoint! We recommend NM Escape to all of our friends and we plan to return as soon as the new one is ready! The puzzles are well thought out and it's apparent that a lot of care goes into designing each room. We couldn't get over how elaborate the tomb was. The craftsmanship was amazing!
